root: ^"If you were here, you would already know."

s: ^"If you weren't a prick, I would care."

scorn: ^He laughs. "Look at this coward! He's spent so long playing around that he's forgotten who he is."
respect: ^He sniffs. "Yeah, that's right." His words fall flat against your stony mien. Sensing this unsettling awkwardness, he turns abruptly to leave, his posse tailing.
anger: ^Suddenly, his is in front of you. Smoke billows from his eyes. "I knew it. I knew you were an arrogant son of a forgotten deity. As if we care. Whether you're here, or you're dead and gone - you're nothing to us.
